original: @75b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @75b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shri badzra p'a ni s'a dha na n'a /
analyzed: shri badzra p'a ni s'a dha na n'a /
translated: śrī-vajrapāṇi-sādhana-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: The Means of Attaining Glorious Vajrapāṇi

original: dpal phyag na rdo rje gsum po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal phyag na rdo rje gsum po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious Vajrapāṇi.

original: gsang ba'i bdag po bsgrub par 'dod pas //
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po bsgrub par 'dod pas //
translated: One who wishes to accomplish the Lord of Secrets

original: dang por chos thams cad stong par bsam /
analyzed: dang por chos thams cad stong par bsam /
translated: firstly imagines all phenomena as empty.

original: de nas snying rje chen po bskyed /
analyzed: de nas snying rje chen po bskyed /
translated: Then one should generate great compassion.

original: de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
translated: Upon that, one imagines a sun maṇḍala.

original: de'i dkyil du h'um mthing nag 'bar ba bsam /
analyzed: de'i dkyil du h'um mthing nag 'bar ba bsam /
translated: In the center of that, one imagines a blazing blue hūṃ.

original: h'um gi 'phro 'du las rdo rje mthing nag 'bar ba h'um gis mtshan pa bsam /
analyzed: h'um gi 'phro 'du las rdo rje mthing nag 'bar ba h'um gis mtshan pa bsam /
translated: From the radiating and reabsorbing of the hūṃ, one imagines a blazing blue vajra marked with hūṃ.

original: aom badzra p'a ni h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzra p'a ni h'um phat /
translated: oṃ vajrapāṇi hūṃ phaṭ

original: ces brjod pas /
analyzed: ces brjod pas /
translated: By reciting this,

original: de dag yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje gtum po shin tu khros /
analyzed: de dag yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje gtum po shin tu khros /
translated: those completely transform into Vajra Caṇḍa, very wrathful,

original: 'jigs su rung ba /
analyzed: 'jigs su rung ba /
translated: frightening,

original: sku mdog mthing nag / spyan gsum pa /🔽'jigs su rung ba sbrul dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: sku mdog mthing nag / spyan gsum pa / 'jigs su rung ba sbrul dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: blue-black, with three eyes,🔽adorned with snakes and ornaments,🔽wearing a tiger-skin skirt,

original: stag lpags kyi sham thabs ce na //
analyzed: stag lpags kyi sham thabs ce na //
translated: and with a crown of dry skulls.

original: phyag g-yas rdo rje rgya gram gyi tho ba 'phyar ba /
analyzed: phyag g-yas rdo rje rgya gram gyi tho ba 'phyar ba /
translated: In his right hand he brandishes a vajra-marked hammer.

original: g-yon mi rus kyi phur pa 'dril @76a * //
analyzed: g-yon mi rus kyi phur pa 'dril @76a * //
translated: In his left hand he holds a human bone dagger.

original: ba cig tu bsams la /🔽aom badzra raksha raksha h'um /
analyzed: ba cig tu bsams la / aom badzra raksha raksha h'um /
translated: Think of him in this way.🔽Om vajra rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ.

original: aom h'um tr'am hr'i:aa:zhes go bgo'o //
analyzed: aom h'um tr'am hr'i:aa:zhes go bgo'o //
translated: Om hūṃ traṃ hrīḥ āḥ.

original: de nas ye shes sems dpa' mdun du bsam /
analyzed: de nas ye shes sems dpa' mdun du bsam /
translated: Think of the wisdom being in front of you.

original: bdun rnam dag bya /
analyzed: bdun rnam dag bya /
translated: Perform the seven-branch service.

original: dza:h'um bam ho:sa rang la bstim /
analyzed: dza:h'um bam ho:sa rang la bstim /
translated: Jḥḥṃ vaṃ hoḥ. Dissolve him into yourself.

original: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
translated: Om vajra caṇḍa mahāroṣaṇa hūṃ phaṭ.

original: sum 'bum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas so //
analyzed: sum 'bum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas so //
translated: Recite this mantra three hundred and twenty-one times.

original: sngags kyi rgyal po 'di cung zad bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad sreg par byed do //
analyzed: sngags kyi rgyal po 'di cung zad bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad sreg par byed do //
translated: By reciting this king of mantras just a little, it burns up all misdeeds.

original: thams cad srung par byed do //
analyzed: thams cad srung par byed do //
translated: It protects everything.

original: gnod pa'i log 'dren thams cad med par byed do //
analyzed: gnod pa'i log 'dren thams cad med par byed do //
translated: It eliminates all harmful obstacles.

original: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a rosha na h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a rosha na h'um phat /
translated: Om vajra caṇḍa mahāroṣaṇa hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ba lim ai dam grihna grihna //
analyzed: ba lim ai dam grihna grihna //
translated: Balim idaṃ gṛhaṇa gṛhaṇa.

original: b'a hi kha' hi /
analyzed: b'a hi kha' hi /
translated: Vāha khahi.

original: bhunydza ho:rakta pi pa to /
analyzed: bhunydza ho:rakta pi pa to /
translated: Bhuñja hoḥ rakta pitta.

original: sam ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sam ye sv'a h'a /
translated: Samaye svāhā.

original: de bsnyen pa byed pa'i dus su rgyun du gtor ma gtong ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: de bsnyen pa byed pa'i dus su rgyun du gtor ma gtong ba'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra for always offering sacrificial cakes while performing the approach.

original: de nas drag po'i las bya ba ra 'dod pas /
analyzed: de nas drag po'i las bya ba ra 'dod pas /
translated: Then, if one wishes to perform wrathful actions,

original: dang por dkyil 'khor ji tsam dran ba cig bya /
analyzed: dang por dkyil 'khor ji tsam dran ba cig bya /
translated: first one should make a maṇḍala as much as one can remember.

original: rdo rje rgya gram bri /
analyzed: rdo rje rgya gram bri /
translated: Draw a vajra cross.

original: ra kun nag por bya /
analyzed: ra kun nag por bya /
translated: Make the goat completely black.

original: re kh'a tshil dang thal chen bsres pas bri /
analyzed: re kh'a tshil dang thal chen bsres pas bri /
translated: Draw the maṇḍala with a mixture of fat and great ash.

original: de'i dbus su ae gru gsum zabs su mdzub gang ba cig brus la /
analyzed: de'i dbus su ae gru gsum zabs su mdzub gang ba cig brus la /
translated: In the center of that, dig a triangular e[-shaped] pit one finger [deep].🔽Smear the inside with the ash of burnt corpses.

original: nang ro bsregs pa'i thal bas byug / gru gsum de'i phyi rol dmar por bya /
analyzed: nang ro bsregs pa'i thal bas byug / gru gsum de'i phyi rol dmar por bya /
translated: Outside of that triangular [pit], make [the maṇḍala] red.

original: de ni dkyil 'khor bya ba'i thabs so //
analyzed: de ni dkyil 'khor bya ba'i thabs so //
translated: That is the method of making the maṇḍala.

original: de nas ling+ga bca' ba'i thabs na /
analyzed: de nas ling+ga bca' ba'i thabs na /
translated: Then, the method of making the liṅga:

original: spra tshil las ling+ga sor bzhi pa byas la de'i snying gar shog bu la dmar chen gyis rdo rje rgya gram bris la /
analyzed: spra tshil las ling+ga sor bzhi pa byas la de'i snying gar shog bu la dmar chen gyis rdo rje rgya gram bris la /
translated: Make a liṅga from beeswax, four fingerbreadths in size. In its heart, draw a vajra cross with great red on paper.

original: bsgrub bya rang gi rten dang bral bar bsam /
analyzed: bsgrub bya rang gi rten dang bral bar bsam /
translated: Think that the victim is separated from his own support.🔽Write the name in the center of the triangle and insert it.

original: gru gsum de'i dbus su ming bris la gzhug / de nas gru gsum nang du bcug la /
analyzed: gru gsum de'i dbus su ming bris la gzhug / de nas gru gsum nang du bcug la /
translated: Then, having inserted it into the triangle,

original: ske nas skud pa sngon dmar gyis btags la /
analyzed: ske nas skud pa sngon dmar gyis btags la /
translated: Tie a red and blue string around his neck.

original: de'i sna la mi'i rje ngar gyi phur pa sor bzhi pa cig btags la /
analyzed: de'i sna la mi'i rje ngar gyi phur pa sor bzhi pa cig btags la /
translated: Attach a four finger-width human shank-bone to the end of that.

original: 'jigs byed chen por mnga' gsol te /
analyzed: 'jigs byed chen por mnga' gsol te /
translated: Consecrate it as a great terrifying [implement].

original: sngags nam phyed dam nyi ma phyed na brdeg go //
analyzed: sngags nam phyed dam nyi ma phyed na brdeg go //
translated: Recite the mantra at midnight or noon.

original: phyi rol du 'gro ba la sogs pa byed na ling+ga las phur ba mi dbyung bar btab la gzhag go //
analyzed: phyi rol du 'gro ba la sogs pa byed na ling+ga las phur ba mi dbyung bar btab la gzhag go //
translated: If you go outside and so forth, do not remove the dagger from the effigy, but leave it stuck in.

original: mandala dbus su lha'i gdan du byas la /
analyzed: mandala dbus su lha'i gdan du byas la /
translated: Make the deity's seat in the center of the mandala.

original: sum 'bum du bzlas la gdab /
analyzed: sum 'bum du bzlas la gdab /
translated: Recite three hundred thousand times and strike.

original: de'i dus su gtor ma dang mchod pa dus drug tu dbul lo //
analyzed: de'i dus su gtor ma dang mchod pa dus drug tu dbul lo //
translated: At that time, offer the bali and the six times offerings.

original: de 'debs tsa na rang nyid phyag na rdo rje sku mdog sngo nag zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa /
analyzed: de 'debs tsa na rang nyid phyag na rdo rje sku mdog sngo nag zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa /
translated: When you strike, meditate and recite the mantra while imagining yourself as Vajrapāṇi, blue-black in color, with one face and two hands,

original: spyan gsum pa /🔽sbrul gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: spyan gsum pa / sbrul gyis brgyan pa /
translated: with three eyes,🔽adorned with snakes,

original: stag lpags kyi sham thabs can /
analyzed: stag lpags kyi sham thabs can /
translated: wearing a tiger-skin skirt,

original: bsgrub bya'i steng na 'dug pa /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i steng na 'dug pa /
translated: sitting above the victim,

original: phyag na phur bu dang sdigs mdzub mdzad pa cig tu @76b bsgom zhing sngags bzlas la brdeg ga //
analyzed: phyag na phur bu dang sdigs mdzub mdzad pa cig tu @76b bsgom zhing sngags bzlas la brdeg ga //
translated: with a dagger in his hand and making a threatening gesture.

original: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um che ge mo shi ri k'i la ye ta h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um che ge mo shi ri k'i la ye ta h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ vajra caṇḍa mahāroṣaṇa hūṃ. Kill such-and-such, kill!🔽 Stump!🔽 Hūṃ!

original: aa mu ka stam bha ya /🔽hri stam bha ya k'i la ye ta h'um phat ces bzlas la brdeg go //
analyzed: aa mu ka stam bha ya / hri stam bha ya k'i la ye ta h'um phat ces bzlas la brdeg go //
translated: Stump!🔽 Kill!

original: de ltar drag po'i las byed pa'i dus su gtor ma gtong ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: de ltar drag po'i las byed pa'i dus su gtor ma gtong ba'i sngags so //
translated: Thus, at the time of performing wrathful activity, this is the mantra for offering the torma.

original: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a rosha na h'um phat ;
analyzed: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a rosha na h'um phat ;
translated: Oṃ vajra caṇḍa mahāroṣaṇa hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ma ma sarba sha tr'um /🔽aa mu ka ma tsa ye ta pra ya m'am sa dzi bo /🔽bu ga ru dhi ra pri yam bhakshe na ba lim yi dam grihna grihna /
analyzed: ma ma sarba sha tr'um / aa mu ka ma tsa ye ta pra ya m'am sa dzi bo / bu ga ru dhi ra pri yam bhakshe na ba lim yi dam grihna grihna /
translated: All enemies!

original: kh'a hi kh'a hi bhunydza ho:/🔽rakta pi pa to /🔽a'arya pra tsa grihna griahna /
analyzed: kh'a hi kh'a hi bhunydza ho:/ rakta pi pa to / a'arya pra tsa grihna griahna /
translated: Destroy such-and-such!🔽 Eat the flesh, drink the blood, and enjoy the bali!

original: kh'a hi kh'a hi /
analyzed: kh'a hi kh'a hi /
translated: Eat! Eat!🔽 Drink the blood!🔽 Accept! Accept!🔽 Eat! Eat!

original: rakta pi pa to /
analyzed: rakta pi pa to /
translated: Drink the blood!

original: aa ti kra m'a ti sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aa ti kra m'a ti sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
translated: Ati krama mati samaye svāhā.

original: phur bu'i las rdzogs nas mtshon rnon pos ling+ga stod smad du gtubs la /
analyzed: phur bu'i las rdzogs nas mtshon rnon pos ling+ga stod smad du gtubs la /
translated: After completing the kīla activity, cut the liṅga into upper and lower parts with a sharp weapon.

original: smad lha'i zhal du sbyin sreg bya /
analyzed: smad lha'i zhal du sbyin sreg bya /
translated: Burn the lower part in the deity's mouth.

original: stod ming byang dang bcas par mnan pa bya /
analyzed: stod ming byang dang bcas par mnan pa bya /
translated: One should bury it in the north of the place where the name of the upper [part of the country] is.

original: las kyi dus su rdo rje rgya gram gnyis kyi bar du gzugs brnyan de bcug la thod pa'i nang du skud pa sngon dmar gyis dkri'o //
analyzed: las kyi dus su rdo rje rgya gram gnyis kyi bar du gzugs brnyan de bcug la thod pa'i nang du skud pa sngon dmar gyis dkri'o //
translated: At the time of the rite, one should place the effigy between two vajra cross-ties and wrap it with red thread in the skull.

original: skud pa lag pa g-yon pas bzung la /
analyzed: skud pa lag pa g-yon pas bzung la /
translated: One should hold the thread with the left hand.

original: las kyi dus su gzugs brnyan la gnas lngar phur pas gdab /
analyzed: las kyi dus su gzugs brnyan la gnas lngar phur pas gdab /
translated: At the time of the rite, one should drive in the daggers at the five places of the effigy.

original: de nas slar bcug la sngon dmar gyis dkris la lam rgya gram du sba'o //
analyzed: de nas slar bcug la sngon dmar gyis dkris la lam rgya gram du sba'o //
translated: Then, one should again wrap it with red thread, and bury it in a crossroad.

original: de'i steng du phye dang sre mog gis rgya gram bris la gzhag go //
analyzed: de'i steng du phye dang sre mog gis rgya gram bris la gzhag go //
translated: On top of that, one should draw a cross with flour and porridge, and place it there.

original: las 'gor na bskyar la bya'o //
analyzed: las 'gor na bskyar la bya'o //
translated: If the rite is slow, one should repeat it.

original: spra tshil las ling+ga sor bzhi pa byas la /
analyzed: spra tshil las ling+ga sor bzhi pa byas la /
translated: One should make a linga of beeswax four finger-widths in size,

original: bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas par bcug la tsher mas de'i kha la btsugs na /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas par bcug la tsher mas de'i kha la btsugs na /
translated: and place it together with the name of the victim. If one sticks it with thorns into his mouth,

original: phyir rgol ba'i kha tshums par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyir rgol ba'i kha tshums par 'gyur ro //
translated: the mouth of the opponent will be closed.🔽One should name the iron dagger and the human calf,

original: lcags kyi phur bu dang mi'i rje ngar la ming nas smos te /
analyzed: lcags kyi phur bu dang mi'i rje ngar la ming nas smos te /
translated: and

original: yan lag gang dang gang la btab pa de rengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yan lag gang dang gang la btab pa de rengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever limb it is applied to, that will become paralyzed.

original: mtsho lkugs par sbas na ngag rengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtsho lkugs par sbas na ngag rengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If buried in a lake, speech will be paralyzed.

original: sgo rtsar sbas na 'byer bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgo rtsar sbas na 'byer bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If buried at the threshold, [the victim] will be split apart.

original: ral gri la bsngags nas g-yul du zhugs na rgyal bar byed do //
analyzed: ral gri la bsngags nas g-yul du zhugs na rgyal bar byed do //
translated: If one praises a sword and enters into battle, one will be victorious.

original: khros bas snying gar bsnun na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khros bas snying gar bsnun na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one strikes the heart with anger, [the victim] will die.

original: me'i dur du sbas na rims kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me'i dur du sbas na rims kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If buried in a charnel ground, [the victim] will die of fever.

original: rabs chad kyi thod pa la ming dang sngags bris nas rabs cad kya dur du sbas na rabs chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rabs chad kyi thod pa la ming dang sngags bris nas rabs cad kya dur du sbas na rabs chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one writes the name and mantra on the skull of a childless person and buries it in a charnel ground, [the victim] will become childless.

original: mngon par bsngags la dur khrod kyi thal ba'i steng du bzhag na 'byer bar byed do //
analyzed: mngon par bsngags la dur khrod kyi thal ba'i steng du bzhag na 'byer bar byed do //
translated: If one praises and places [the effigy] on top of charnel ground ash, [the victim] will be split apart.

original: khyi nag po'i thod pa la sngags dang ming bcas pa bris nas klu'i gnas su sbas na mdzes zin par 'gyur ro //🔽dbang ma thob cing @77a * //
analyzed: khyi nag po'i thod pa la sngags dang ming bcas pa bris nas klu'i gnas su sbas na mdzes zin par 'gyur ro // dbang ma thob cing @77a * //
translated: If one writes the mantra and name on the skull of a black dog and buries it in a nāga's abode, [the victim] will be seized by nāgas.🔽One should not do this

original: man ngag med //
analyzed: man ngag med //
translated: without empowerment and without instructions,

original: tshad dang mi ldan 'di mi bya //
analyzed: tshad dang mi ldan 'di mi bya //
translated: or without the proper measurements.

original: 'di la nyes pa yod pas na //
analyzed: 'di la nyes pa yod pas na //
translated: Since there is a fault in this,

original: shin tu gsang zhing spel mi bya //
analyzed: shin tu gsang zhing spel mi bya //
translated: it should be kept very secret and not spread.

original: slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa'i gsang ba thugs kyi phur gcig ma'o//
analyzed: slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa'i gsang ba thugs kyi phur gcig ma'o//
translated: This is the Secret Mind Kīla of One Point composed by Ācārya Karmavajra.
